name: Black Diamond Freerider Chalk Bag
description: A traditional design for those who aspire to one day climb Freerider or who just need to keep their mitts dry. A percentage of the sales of this Alex Honnold-signature chalkbag goes to the Honnold Foundation to support solar energy for a more equitable world.Classic cylinder shape has a pliable wire rim and is made with repurposed materials.Fleece-lined interior with cinching cord-lock closure.Brush holder.Webbing belt with quick-release buckle.Limited-edition colour with Alex Honnold's signature.A portion of sales goes to the Honnold Foundation.
